description: ExposomeShiny is a standalone web application implemented in R. It is available as source files and can be installed in any server or computer avoiding problems with data confidentiality. It is executed in RStudio which opens a browser window with the web application and provides a bridge between researchers and most of the state-of-the-art exposome analysis methodologies, without the need for advanced programming skills.
name: exposomeShiny

metadata.title: Software Application Profile: ExposomeShiny - A toolbox for exposome data analysis
